attributes.contentHtml: RumGuru Hes stupid because he caught you? Bitch please, the guy you were supporting demoted you right in front of my eyes, Even thunderx doesn't trust you because we already knew what your intentions were. btw, How were you going to improve the server by getting access to our domain and staff panel? Please tell, I am dying to hear your lame coverups.
